'''Bathing in Flowing Moonlight''' is a [[Login Event]] in [[Version 4.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/09/29 04:00 - 2023/10/16 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 5 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, log in on 7 days in total to receive [[Intertwined Fate]] x10 and other rewards!
